author: Adam King
comment: As the title suggests i really like the look of the watch face, however, it seemed like it drained my watches battery in 4 hours, however its been stuck on 6% for the last 4 hours...bug maybe? Fixable with an update? I really like it but i dont know how long its going to last.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Adam, I am getting almost 2 days on this face. Can you please drop me a note at support@seenapps.com to figure things out?

title: I really like it but....

author: Ron Harris
comment: I am old enough that I had a Timex watch with the black face that showed the time as a red LED and it was so advance in the 1970's, the time showed when you turned your wrist.  I want that watch face, this is real close, I would like options to turn off everything but the time and make time larger or smaller.
title: Almost Retro..Good Watch Face

author: G Wills
comment: Great idea, but background to the time blends into the numbers being shown often, so time is always 88:88.... Shame

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Goeff, Are you getting this with all colors?

title: Dull... Hardly visible

author: Chris Smith
comment: I just got it and figured out how to change the colors I like the colors too bad you couldn't change the colors to whichever one you want I'm sure you can do that in a future update if you want but so far it's a good one keep up the good work Chris

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hi Chris, please check out LED Time which allows more colors and settings. Best.

title: CMS

author: danieL H
comment: Can you make the dim red lights/ circles more dim.. They aren't dim enough to tell them apart from the ones that are at full brightness and are meant to show the time

author: BJ Bee
comment: Please make a color ambient mode,  the black and white mode is boring and will probably use the same amount of battery power as a color one.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content:
Hello BJ, Please check version 1.3 of LedTime: https://goo.gl/ADtmno
It is doing just that.

title: color ambient mode

author: Gemma James
comment: I have downloaded this but can't find it on my watch or phone. Edit: it took about half an hour to appear on my phone. Happy with it so far.

author: Sean Machan
comment: Would look really cool if the color stayed in ambient mode.  As it stands, the fade to white really kills it.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Sean, this is a feature in "LedTime" which is here: https://goo.gl/ADtmno

author: Danny Thoeng
comment: I am stuck with red. How to change to green or other colors.. Tx.. Very retro.. Love it

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello. Try touch and hold the face until the watch vibrates, then click on the gears.

title: Great..

reply.content: Hello Matthew. Can you please drop me a note at support@seenapps.com? I would like to ask few questions about your device.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Nik, we added that in LedTime, which is here: https://goo.gl/ADtmno

title: Great looking face

author: Ted Miller
comment: A nice face for showing off my watch. Wish I could keep the screen from going ambient longer to watch the seconds go by
title: Show it off

author: Avijit Pal
comment: It would be great to receive advice on how to go about changing the colors.

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hi Avijit, just press and hold the face until it vibrates, then press the cog at the bottom. This goes for all faces on your watch!

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content: Hello Matt, if you are using the S2, it is not compatible with any Android Wear app.

author: Razvan Dumitrescu
comment: Doesn't work on Sony Smartwatch 2

reply.author: SeenApps
reply.content:
Hi SW2 are not compatible with Android Wear. You may have noticed that no store face work on your watch. On the bright side, you don't need a refund!
Sorry for your frustration.
